00036 #ifndef mrWin32_h
00037 #define mrWin32_h
00038 
00039 
00040 // For creating/using mrLibrary, define export/import functions
00041 // both with same name.
00042 // During creation of mrLibrary, MR_LIBRARY_EXPORT is set, while
00043 // for shaders, it should not remain set.
00044 #ifdef MR_LIBRARY_EXPORT
00045 #define MR_LIB_EXPORT _declspec( dllexport ) 
00046 #else
00047 #define MR_LIB_EXPORT _declspec( dllimport ) 
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 // make inline a non-optional keyword
00051 #define inline __forceinline 
00052 
00053 // avoid warnings related to exceptions, when shaders get
00054 // compiled without exceptions
00055 #pragma warning( disable : 4530 )   
00056 #pragma warning( disable : 4042 )
00057 #pragma warning( disable : 4290 )
00058 
00059 // avoid warnings of templates exceeding 255 chars
00060 #pragma warning( disable : 4786 )
00061 
00062 
00063 // make sure templates inline at any depth
00064 #pragma inline_depth( 255 )
00065 #pragma inline_recursion( on )
00066 #pragma auto_inline( on )
00067 
00068 #ifdef _DEBUG
00069 #define DEBUG
00070 #endif
00071 
00072 // Get rid of the microsoft min/max macros
00073 #undef min
00074 #undef max
00075 
00076 // And define min/max in namespace std, since microsoft forgot (v6)
00077 #ifdef MSVC6
00078 // C++ std defines__LINE__, __FILE__ and __FUNTION__
00079 // MSVC6 does not define __FUNCTION__
00080 #define __FUNCTION__ ""
00081 #endif  // MSVC6
00082 
00084 #include "float.h"   // for _isnan()
00085 #undef  ISNAN
00086 #define ISNAN(x) ::_isnan(x)
00087 
00088 
00089 #include "mrStackTrace_win32.h"
00090 #define MR_STACK_TRACE  RaiseException(EXCEPTION_BREAKPOINT, \
00091                                        EXCEPTION_NONCONTINUABLE, 0, NULL);
00092 
00093 
00094 #endif // mrWin32_h
